alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:51PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong winds bringing blowing dust to northern Lander/Eureka counties this evening... Strong southwest winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts of 45 mph have brought dust from the Carson Sink to portions of northern Lander and Eureka counties. As of 745 pm, Nevada Department of Transportation webcams and satellite imagery are showing a dust plume stretching from Churchill county northeast into Lander county. Automated sensors are showing at least 5 miles visibility at Battle Mountain airport. Look for reduced visibility to three miles in spots along I-80 from Dunphy to just east of Valmy. The dust will slowly settle out during the overnight hours. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
